title: Butter and Sage Sauce
introduction: Butter and sage sauce is a simple yet classic accompaniment for fresh egg pasta, especially stuffed variants like ravioli. This recipe highlights the importance of using fresh butter and finishing with a generous sprinkle of Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese to bring out its rich, savory flavors.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Melt the butter with the sage over low heat.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Serve with hot, cooked pasta and top with Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.

variations.name: Brown Butter Sauce
variations.description: Cook the butter for a few minutes until it browns lightly. Leave out the sage.

variations.name: Hazelnut Sauce
variations.description: Add 1/4 cup chopped toasted hazelnuts to the butter. Leave out the sage.
